author: popef
content:
We have both
```
degree_poly = int.to_bytes(FIELD_ELEMENTS_PER_BLOB, 8, ENDIANNESS)
```
and
```
degree_poly = int.to_bytes(FIELD_ELEMENTS_PER_BLOB, 16, ENDIANNESS)
```
Additionally, we also have
```
num_commitments = int.to_bytes(len(commitments), 8, ENDIANNESS)
```
All of them are used just to compute the fiat-shamir challenge. I think they will not be reused much and I think it's not trivial to get good names for them.
